line.originaltext: 1/4 cup sifted all-purpose flour
1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder
1/2 teaspoon baking powder
1 pinch salt
2 ounces butter
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/4 cup white sugar
1 egg
2 egg yolks
1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Butter one Madeleine pan.
Butter one Madeleine pan.
Sift the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt together.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing10, "powder mix", "sift together")

line.originaltext: Cream the butter with the vanilla and the sugar.
Add the egg and egg yolks, beating to mix.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing7, ing8}, ing12, "beaten mix", "beat to mix")

line.originaltext: Stir in the dry ingredients until just combined only, do not over mix.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing12}, ing13, "dough", "stir in until just combined only, do not over mix")

line.originaltext: Place rounded teaspoon of batter into the prepared Madeleine shell forms.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing13, t0, ing14, "madeleines", "bake at 375 degrees F for 12 minutes")

line.originaltext: Remove from oven and immediately invert onto a wire rack to cool.
Remove from oven and immediately invert onto a wire rack to cool.
Remove from oven and immediately invert onto a wire rack to cool.
Once cool sprinkle with confectioners' sugar, if desired.
